description: Erection of rear dormer loft conversion including Juliet balcony
decision_conditions: The erection of rear dormer loft conversion including Juliet balcony falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended)

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please provide existing floor plans at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing the outline of entire floor plan, not just part and all key dimensions for the proposed works.All drawings should be clearly titled as "Existing" as it needs to be clear for public viewing.
